DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate whether antibiotic mandatory treatment acute uncomplicated right-sided diverticulitis . The hypothesis patient acute uncomplicated diverticulitis right-sided colon recover without antibiotic .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial Uncomplicated Diverticulitis Right Colon
DOC.detailed_description: All patient study randomly allocate one follow two treatment group ; no-antibiotics group antibiotic group . Patients no-antibiotics group admit ward administer intravenous fluid bowel rest least 5 day clinical symptom sign stabilize . And patient discharge oral intake tolerate . In antibiotic group , treatment initiate intravenous combination third generation cephalosporin quinolone metronidazole oral intake tolerate . Oral antibiotic cefpodoxime together metronidazole initiate subsequently ward . The total duration antibiotic treatment expect average 10days . Patients group re-visited outpatient clinic expect average 7 day check-up serology test ( include complete blood count C-reactive protein ) , expect average 6 week CT . If patient re-visit outpatient clinic , check call .
